Bananas and oranges are both rich in vitamin C, dietary fiber, potassium, and other essential vitamins and minerals. They are also low in calories and fat-free, making them a healthy snack choice.
Bananas and oranges are both rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Bananas are high in potassium, magnesium, and vitamin B6, while oranges are packed with vitamin C, calcium, and folate.
